header.description: Invoice metadata and vendor/client contact information for the document header

rows.description: Itemized line items for the invoice table — one row per product/service

totals.description: Financial summary — subtotal, tax, and final balance due

semantics: All data is sourced directly from tables with no user-supplied filter parameters. Tokens map to table columns or remain unresolved (vendor contact info not in catalog).
transformations: No reshaping required — the schema is already in normalized form with a 1:N relationship between invoices and invoice_items.
